document_data.name: Kymas Nahpret
document_data.mainbody: '''Kymas Nahpret''' was a [[vampire]] [[Red Wizards of Thay|Red Wizard]] of [[Thay]] and a [[necromancer]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, together with [[Umara Ankhlab]], Kymas was tasked by [[Szass Tam]] with the mission of finding the young [[Chosen]] of [[Lathander]], [[Stedd Whitehorn]]. When Umara and the pirate captain [[Anton Marivaldi]] finally decided to instead help Stedd in his mission for Lathander, Kymas tried to stop them but was instead killed.
